How to build FEM-modules

[!] To run pkg2fem script you must have 'cdrtools' 
    package installed.

1. Put all packages to one directory (for example, pkg)
2. Run command

   ./pkg2fem pkg
   
3. Enter desired name of your FEM module. Description
   and category are optional - you may just press Enter.
4. Wait.
5. In directory with script will be created FEM module.


To use module, you may put it:

Á) to ISO-image, directory frenzy/fem
Â) to any readable partition of hard drive, directory frenzy/fem

Modules will be automatically loaded when Frenzy boots.
